section1.title: STAGE 1
section1.text: Stage 1 will focus on the power of networking by helping each other and expanding through brand collaborations.

section2.title: BLOOM PAD
section2.text: An Accelerator & Incubator Program for holders to create NFTs/stories in the world of Bloom Town.

section3.title: COMPANION NFT
section3.text: Bloom Town is filled with wonderful and dreamy critters, our plan is to introduce the Bloom World with a companion NFT and create many stories under our brand.

section1.title: STAGE 2
section1.text: Stage 2 will be working towards expanding the brand and bringing it to mainstream consumption.

section2.title: BLOOM TOWN APP
section2.text: The app will help players track their earnings from the RPG game and can control their character stats/actions when the story progresses.

section3.title: BLOOM TOWN ADVENTURES
section3.text: With an amalgamation of great storytellers and RPG creators on our team, we plan to expand and create BloomTown into a 100% on-chain NFT game. A town where players can use other NFT characters (for example CoolCats, WonderPals, Invisible Friends, etc.) in our story with Hero Packs. Players will have chances to earn unique 1/1 items and can resell or stake them to earn in the game. To engage our users in a playful manner.
